document.full_text: most people could not spell "cymotrichous" with a dictionary, but a 14 year-old girl from pennsylvania, sukanya roy, spelled the word on thursday to win a marathon-length 2011 scripps national spelling bee.
document.title: youth wins spelling bee with "cymotrichous"
lines_and_colors: most people could not spell "cymotrichous" with a dictionary, but a 14 year-old girl from pennsylvania, sukanya roy, spelled the word on thursday to win a marathon-length 2011 scripps national spelling bee.
